title: Problem 2127_D
statement: Heartfall River runs horizontally through Destinyland and divides it into the northern and southern sides.Engineer Root wants to build n houses along the river, numbered from 1 to n. All houses on the northern side and all houses on the southern side must lie along straight lines parallel to Heartfall River.There will be m bridges, with the i-th bridge connecting house u_i and house v_i (u_i ≠ v_i).
